code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import MouseParticles from"react-mouse-particles";import Main from'../layouts/Main';import Cell from'../components/Projects/Cell';import data from'../data/games';import Particles from"react-tsparticles";import particlesOptions from"../particles.json";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Games=()=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Main,{title:"Games",description:"Hi, welcome to try my games!",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("article",{className:"post",id:"games",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Particles,{options:particlesOptions}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MouseParticles,{g:2.3,num:1,radius:8,life:0.8,v:1.2,color:"random",alpha:0.16,level:6})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"title",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{"data-testid":"heading",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/games",children:"Games"})})})}),data.map(game=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Cell,{data:game},game.title))]})});export default Games;
